comments:

view and the .log file. The .log file contained the following:

resource name: /Test

The Error View shows me a summary line saying:

Error Jul 14, 2004 13:49:55.888 java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Path must
include project and resource name: /Test

When I double click on this line, it brings up the "Event Details" dialog, which
 says "An exception stack trace could not be found." in the stack trace pane.

This occurs on both Linux and OS X
Please attach the full log file that you are referring to. Thanks.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 68158 ***
